basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software developer working on great digital experiences. I'm a passionate person who loves to learn new things and share my knowledge with others.

about: Software Developer, passionate about technology and programming. Proficient in web development technologies, tools and methodologies, as Git/GitHub, CI/CD, SOLID, etc. Focused on providing valuable solutions to problems. Enjoy working on productive and collaborative teams, making good relationships with my co-workers, while keeping respect and empathy. 'First solve the problem, then write the code' is my motto.
